dashboard.emptyState.description: Begin with Genie — transform your OpenShift data into insight, and insight into action.
dashboard.emptyState.heading: Every dashboard tells a story. What will yours say, {{name}}?
dashboard.emptyState.headingNoName: Every dashboard tells a story. What will yours say?
onboarding.aiCommandCenter.description: Ask anything. Get answers. Troubleshoot, analyze, and understand your entire fleet just by asking. It's the power of your data, in plain language.
onboarding.aiCommandCenter.label: AI Command Center
onboarding.aiCommandCenter.title: Intelligence at your command
onboarding.canvasMode.description: Transform answers into custom dashboards. In Canvas Mode, you can effortlessly arrange, customize, and build the precise view you need to monitor what matters most.
onboarding.canvasMode.label: Canvas Mode
onboarding.canvasMode.title: Go from conversation to clarity.
onboarding.privacy.description:
Project Genie is powered by generative AI. To protect your security, please do not include personal information or sensitive data (like secrets or API keys) in your conversations.

Your interactions may be used to improve Red Hat products and services.
onboarding.privacy.linkText: Read the Red Hat Privacy Statement
onboarding.privacy.title: Important privacy notice
onboarding.sharing.description: An insight is only powerful when it's shared. Save any view to your library and share it with your team in a single click. Drive decisions, together.
onboarding.sharing.label: Sharing
onboarding.sharing.title: Share your vision. Instantly.
onboarding.welcome.description: Harness the full potential of the hybrid cloud, simply by asking.
onboarding.welcome.title: Welcome to Red Hat Genie
notifications.emptyState.heading: No notifications
notifications.emptyState.description: You don’t have any notifications right now. New alerts and updates will appear here as they come in.
newChat.heading: What's on your mind, {{name}}?
newChat.description: Genie can help you explore, build, and troubleshoot OpenShift — all in one place.
newChat.promptPlaceholder: How can I support you today?
chatHistory.emptyState.heading: Ready to chat?
chatHistory.emptyState.description: Your chat history is currently empty. Start a new conversation and we'll keep a record of it for you here.
chatHistory.error.heading: Error loading conversations
chatHistory.error.description: There was an error loading your conversations. Please try again later or try refreshing the page.
chatHistory.noResults.heading: No results found
chatHistory.noResults.description: No conversations match your search "{{searchTerm}}". Try adjusting your search terms.
chat.sources.description: The following sources were used to generate this AI response and provide supporting information:
chat.tools.description: The following tools were used to generate this AI response and assist in providing supporting information:
canvasCard.viewingAriaLabel: {{title}} is currently open in the canvas
chat.header.error.missingConversationId: Unable to save without a conversation ID. Try again after the chat loads.
chat.deleteModal.title: Delete '{{title}}'?
chat.deleteModal.body: This will move the chat to Trash. Any artifacts (like dashboards or YAML files) created in this chat will also be moved to Trash. Items in Trash are permanently deleted after 30 days.
chat.deleteToast.title: Chat conversation moved to Trash
chat.deleteToast.description: It will be permanently deleted in 30 days.
newChat.intro.build: Ready to build. I can help you generate configuration files, deploy applications, or set up new OpenShift resources. What are you working on?
newChat.intro.automate: Let's streamline your workflow. I can generate Ansible Playbooks, Tekton pipelines, or scripts to handle repetitive tasks. What process would you like to automate?
newChat.intro.troubleshoot: I'm ready to investigate. To get started, please paste an error log, describe the symptom, or tag the resource (e.g., #[pod-name]) you are having trouble with.
newChat.intro.analyze: Let's optimize your environment. I can analyze your clusters for security vulnerabilities, resource efficiency, or performance bottlenecks. Where should we focus?
newChat.intro.explore: I can act as your co-pilot for the entire OpenShift lifecycle. From troubleshooting complex errors to generating full dashboards, I'm here to help. Here are a few high-value tasks you can try right now:
newChat.quickResponses.build.0.label: Generate Deployment YAML
newChat.quickResponses.build.1.label: Create NetworkPolicy
newChat.quickResponses.build.2.label: Configure new Route
newChat.quickResponses.build.3.label: Set up BuildConfig
newChat.quickResponses.automate.0.label: Create Ansible Playbook
newChat.quickResponses.automate.1.label: Set up Tekton Pipeline
newChat.quickResponses.automate.2.label: Automate Operator updates
newChat.quickResponses.automate.3.label: Generate CronJob
newChat.quickResponses.analyze.0.label: Scan images for vulnerabilities
newChat.quickResponses.analyze.1.label: Analyze cluster capacity
newChat.quickResponses.analyze.2.label: Check for RBAC drift
newChat.quickResponses.analyze.3.label: Review ResourceQuotas
newChat.quickResponses.explore.0.label: Show the health of my cluster
newChat.quickResponses.explore.1.label: Create a dashboard for Pod status
newChat.quickResponses.explore.2.label: Find documentation for Service Mesh
newChat.quickResponses.explore.3.label: Explain Deployment vs. DeploymentConfig
artifactLibrary.emptyState.heading: Start something extraordinary.
artifactLibrary.emptyState.description: Everything you create with Genie—or that others share with you—will live here. Begin with a dashboard, a snippet, or any artifact.
artifactLibrary.error.heading: Could not load artifacts.
artifactLibrary.error.description: A problem occurred while retrieving your library artifacts.
appMenu.title: Red Hat applications
userAccount.menu.title: User account menu
feedback.badResponse.modal.title: Provide additional feedback
feedback.badResponse.form.label: Your feedback helps improve our AI's quality.  What was wrong?
feedback.badResponse.form.description.la: Please provide a brief description of the issue
feedback.badResponse.form.description.pl: Explain why this response is problematic.  Your detailed feedback is valuable for our review.
feedback.badResponse.form.disclaimer: A human team will review your report and the associated conversation context. Do not include personal or sensitive information in the description box above.
feedback.badResponse.type.incorrect.desc: Contains factual errors or flawed logic.
feedback.badResponse.type.unhelpful.desc: Doesn't answer the prompt's intent or is not relevant.
feedback.badResponse.type.incomplete.des: Response is missing information or seems cut off.
feedback.badResponse.type.harmful.label: Harmful
feedback.badResponse.type.harmful.descri: Offensive, disrespectful, or promotes bad practices.
feedback.badResponse.type.other.label: Other
feedback.badResponse.error.generic: An error occurred while submitting feedback
feedback.badResponse.error.title: Error submitting feedback
feedback.badResponse.success.title: Feedback received
feedback.badResponse.success.description: We'll use this to improve the AI's quality
message.edit.error.title: Unable to edit message
message.edit.error.description: Please try again after the conversation loads.
feedback.success.title: Feedback submitted successfully
feedback.error.title: Failed to submit feedback
